explains: v. 使泄气，使灰心；使打消念头，劝阻；阻碍

sentences.en: His parents tried to discourage him from being an actor.
sentences.cn: 他的父母试图阻止他去当演员。

sentences.en: The Swiss wanted to discourage an inflow of foreign money.
sentences.cn: 瑞士人想要阻止外资流入。

sentences.en: He explained the yellow fever epidemic as a providential act to discourage urban growth.
sentences.cn: 他对黄热病疫情对城市化进程的阻碍为一种巧合做出了解释。
